---
category: news
title: "Google Open-Sources Token-Free Language Model ByT5"
excerpt: "Google Research has open-sourced ByT5, a natural language processing (NLP) AI model that operates on raw bytes instead of abstract tokens. Compared to baseline models, ByT5 is more accurate on several benchmark tasks and is more robust to misspellings and noise."
